item.content:encoded:
A Closer Look at Life and Death

Book Series

by Tracy Jones — Non-Fiction Author | Researcher | Speaker

Exploring Life, Death, and the Mysteries of Eternal Existence through Divine Revelations and Scholarly Research of Compelling Truths

It's Time For 'You' To Face Eternity!

Shop Books
Learn More
item.excerpt:encoded: Exploring Life, Death, and the Mysteries of Eternal Existence through Divine Revelations and Scholarly Research of Compelling Truths

item.title: About Tracy Jones
item.dc:creator: tracyjones
item.content:encoded:
Meet the Author

Electrical Engineer ~ Scientist (NASA Fellow) ~ Researcher ~ Author ~ Minister ~ Repentant Sinner

My Background

I hail from Birmingham, Alabama. I am a graduate of Tuskegee University where I received a NASA Fellowship and worked for Lewis Research Center in Research and Development (Aircraft) and received a BS in Electrical Engineering.

I specialized in Electrical Design, Automation Programming (PLC) in Manufacturing, Automotive Technology, High Voltage Power Transmission and Nuclear Power, Information Technology, Project Management, and held management roles. I also worked in Military Civilian capacities, as well as in the private sector.

My Spiritual Journey

At the age of 12, I began to have supernatural experiences, which I later found was an out-of-body experience. This profound incident propelled my quest to research what happened to me.

I continued to have various experiences, including when the Holy Spirit came to me (1996), about writing His revelations down to share with those who have ears to listen during these end times and last days.

Perhaps this is a 'Last Call' for many to determine if what they believe is 'fact or fiction' before their certain date with death. My goal is to aid you in making an informed decision regarding where you will spend eternity.

My Commitment

During my college years, I made a commitment to the Lord, humbly saying, 'If I can study all these books to become an engineer, I can commit to studying and learning more about you.'

I continued to have supernatural experiences which propelled more research. With decades of experience in Science, Research, and over twenty-nine years (1996) of divinely inspired writing, I have dedicated my life to being the vessel of the Holy Spirit.

My work makes the complexity of Biblical Eschatology and the meaning of life, death, our eternity past and future accessible from a Non-Religious perspective. My work spans multiple disciplines, from science to personal development, always with a focus on making God's eternal truth tangible and practical in our world.

My Published Works

As an author of several published works, including magazines, I have had the privilege of reaching readers across the globe.

Each book represents years of supernatural experiences, divine revelations, research, real-world insights, and a deep commitment to help others gain an understanding about our eternal Spirits, life, death, and the interconnectedness of all realms in the Universe... Heaven, Hell and Earth.

This book series is from God's perspective... in His own words, taken directly from His Holy Bible, so that He can tell you His profoundly expressed desire: That NONE of us should perish, but that all should come to repentance and receive everlasting life.

"Our Spirit, which now resides within our body, consists of our mind, thought, memory, our word, and character, which are eternal; everything else perishes... the body, material things, and the spheres."

Tracy Jones

"Knowledge came to Humanity by the 'Choice' between 'Two Trees' ... 'My people are destroyed for lack of [my] knowledge' (Hosea 4:6)"
item.excerpt:encoded: Award-winning non-fiction author, researcher, and speaker. Graduate of Tuskegee University, NASA Fellowship recipient, and dedicated vessel of the Holy Spirit with over 29 years of divinely inspired writing.

item.title: Books
item.dc:creator: tracyjones
item.content:encoded:
A Closer Look at Life and Death — Book Series

Explore Tracy Jones's published works exploring life, death, and eternal questions through divine revelations and scholarly research.

Second Edition (2025)

A Closer Look at Life and Death — Volume I

  • ISBN (Paperback): 979-8999333605
  • ISBN (eBook): 979-8999333612
  • ISBN (Hardcover): 979-8999333650
  • Published: 2025

Pricing:

  • Paperback: $19.75
  • eBook/Kindle: $12.99
  • Hardcover/Cloth: $100.00
  • Signed Copy: Add $40.00 + Shipping
  • Signed Hardcover: Add $100.00 + Shipping
  • PDF (2nd Edition): $15.99

After three decades of divinely inspired writing, A Closer Look at Life and Death invites readers on a profound journey into the nature of existence, consciousness, and eternity. Life is Spiritual. Thought is Spiritual. Life and Death are Spiritual Universal phenomena. Spirituality is our true Reality!

A Closer Look at Life and Death explains life, death, and eternal existence from their true spiritual source.

First Edition — Republished (2025)

Buy on Amazon - $19.75 + Shipping
item.excerpt:encoded: Explore the published works of Tracy Jones including A Closer Look at Life and Death book series. Available in paperback, eBook, hardcover, and signed copies.

item.title: Blog
item.dc:creator: tracyjones
item.excerpt:encoded: Read the latest articles, insights, and reflections from Tracy Jones on life, death, spirituality, and eternal existence.

item.title: Speaking & Workshops
item.dc:creator: tracyjones
item.content:encoded:
Tracy Jones is available for speaking engagements, workshops, and conferences. With decades of experience spanning science, research, and spiritual exploration, Tracy brings a unique perspective that bridges the gap between empirical knowledge and divine truth.

Speaking Topics

Life, Death & Eternity

Exploring what happens when we die and the nature of eternal existence through divine revelations and scholarly research.

Spiritual Reality

Understanding that life is spiritual, thought is spiritual, and spirituality is our true reality.

Science & Faith

Bridging the gap between scientific discovery and spiritual truth through decades of research and experience.

Consciousness Beyond the Body

Exploring out-of-body experiences, divine encounters, and what they reveal about the nature of human consciousness and spirit.

To book Tracy for your event, please visit the contact page.
item.excerpt:encoded: Book Tracy Jones for speaking engagements and workshops on life, death, eternity, spiritual reality, and the intersection of science and faith.

item.title: Courses

item.content:encoded:
Online courses and educational content from Tracy Jones are coming soon. Stay tuned for in-depth learning experiences covering life, death, eternal existence, and spiritual development.

Subscribe to the newsletter to be notified when new courses become available.
item.excerpt:encoded: Online courses and educational content from Tracy Jones exploring life, death, and eternal existence.

item.title: Scholarship
item.dc:creator: tracyjones
item.content:encoded:
Face Eternity is committed to empowering the next generation through educational support and scholarship opportunities.

Scholarship Opportunities

As someone who benefited from educational opportunities including a NASA Fellowship at Tuskegee University, Tracy Jones understands the transformative power of education. The Face Eternity scholarship program aims to support students pursuing knowledge and understanding.

For more information about available scholarships and how to apply, please contact us.
item.excerpt:encoded: Learn about scholarship opportunities from Face Eternity, committed to empowering the next generation through educational support.

Website: faceeternity.org
item.excerpt:encoded: Get in touch with Tracy Jones for book inquiries, speaking engagements, signed copies, scholarship information, or general questions.

item.title: A Closer Look at Life and Death - Volume I (2nd Edition)
item.dc:creator: tracyjones
item.content:encoded:
After three decades of divinely inspired writing, A Closer Look at Life and Death invites readers on a profound journey into the nature of existence, consciousness, and eternity.

Life is Spiritual. Thought is Spiritual. Life and Death are Spiritual Universal phenomena... Spirituality is our true Reality!

A Closer Look at Life and Death explains life, death, and eternal existence from their true spiritual source. This comprehensive work draws from decades of supernatural experiences, divine revelations, scholarly research, and biblical analysis to present a profound understanding of our eternal nature.

Key Themes

  • Life is spiritual, thought is spiritual
  • Consciousness is not in the brain
  • Life after death and eternal spirit life
  • What happens when we die
  • Death is not the end
  • Spiritual reality and consciousness beyond the body
  • Biblical Eschatology and Christian Theology
  • Purpose of Life and Redemption

Available on Amazon (Paperback, Kindle, Hardcover) and Barnes & Noble.
item.excerpt:encoded: After three decades of divinely inspired writing, A Closer Look at Life and Death invites readers on a profound journey into the nature of existence, consciousness, and eternity.

item.title: A Closer Look at Life and Death - Volume I (1st Edition, Republished)
item.dc:creator: tracyjones
item.content:encoded:
The first edition of A Closer Look at Life and Death, now republished with updated formatting and availability. This foundational work began Tracy Jones's literary journey exploring the profound questions of life, death, and eternal existence.

Available in paperback and eBook formats.
item.excerpt:encoded: The republished first edition of A Closer Look at Life and Death by Tracy Jones. Available in paperback and eBook formats.

item.title: A Closer Look at Life and Death - Volume I (Original, 2022)
item.dc:creator: tracyjones
item.content:encoded:
The original first edition of A Closer Look at Life and Death, published November 11, 2022. This is the work that started it all — Tracy Jones's inaugural published exploration of life, death, and eternal existence.

Available in paperback format.
item.excerpt:encoded: The original 2022 first edition of A Closer Look at Life and Death by Tracy Jones. Available in paperback.

item.title: A Profound, Quietly Powerful Work
item.dc:creator: tracyjones
item.content:encoded: With each page, Tracy Jones explores the delicate balance between living fully and accepting mortality. A profound, quietly powerful work.

item.title: Simple, Beautiful Reflections
item.dc:creator: tracyjones
item.content:encoded: This book turns life's biggest questions into simple, beautiful reflections. Tracy Jones writes with a grace that stays in the heart.

item.title: Mysteries of Eternal Existence
item.dc:creator: tracyjones
item.content:encoded: Brilliantly explores the mysteries of our eternal existence... a deep, comprehensive view of life's meaning within God's redemption plan.

item.title: A Transformative Experience - Global Book Review
item.dc:creator: tracyjones
item.content:encoded: At its core, Jones' book is a spiritual exploration, delving into the timeless questions that have haunted humanity since the dawn of consciousness. Throughout the book, Jones shares personal anecdotes and experiences, weaving them seamlessly into her philosophical musings. This lends an intimate touch to her writing, allowing readers to connect with her journey on a deeply personal level. It's this authenticity that makes 'A Closer Look at Life and Death' not just a book series, but a transformative experience for those who dare to delve into its pages. A MUST READ!

item.title: Best Book of 2025

item.content:encoded: This book doesn't just explain life and deathit redefines them. The best book I've read in 2025.
